comment: His class was the very first dual enrollment class I ever took. His lectures were fun and not boring, and he keeps your attention well. I feel like I really learned a lot during his class as well. He was very understand of late work when you have a good reason (like when my high school went on a week-long trip.) The workload wasn't too heavy
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: Very sweet man! Research based class, the papers aren't difficult. He gives excellent feedback on your papers, and will help you with anything! 4 major papers, online discussions, in class peer reviews, and the final is a presentation on you research topic. Not a difficult class, show up, engage in class, do the work and you'll pass easily.

Mr. Ledford was the sweetest & most laid back professor I've had at KSU. I took him for both 1101 and 1102 because he was great. His lectures can get kinda boring but bearable. He grades fairly & lays out everything you need to do in the rubric. The final is a presentation that you do with a group. Cares about his student. Had a 100 in both classes
Best English Professor I've ever had. He's very laid back and takes time to read your paper and gives really good feedback. He's not too strict and I would definitely take him again.

His class consists of a few discussion posts, 3-4 writing assignments and that is it. He does not give extra homework and the "assigned readings" are all needed for the discussion post so you aren't doing any extra work. He is pretty lenient on attendance but he does have a maximum number of classes you can miss before he has to dock your grade.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I took him for ENGL 1101 and I'm currently taking him for 1102. He is a great professor who wants you to succeed and will do everything he can to help you get the grade you want as long as you're willing to put in some effort. The only grades are essays, a final project, discussion posts, and workshops that require you to be there.
Easy class, Grades papers quickly and gives good feedback
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Gives great feedback. Will take as long as you need to explain what he expects from you pertaining to an assignment. Overall a very nice professor.

Mr. Ledford is really sweet. If you have a legitimate reason to be missing class and email him, he wont count it against you. An easy grader and gives really good feedback. Final was a 5 minute presentation in front of class. Only 3 papers. Offered us an opportunity to do a survey to make up for missing homework grades...
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: He is such an easy teacher. You just do the discussion posts and write some papers, and you're good to go. He is very nice. Although, he is a little bit of a pushover because any time the entire class would be talking over him, he would just let it happen. Definitely recommend him, though. He is very approachable.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--SO MANY PAPERS--Clear grading criteria

comment: His class is nothing special, it is often just a lecture during the first half and then a group activity during the second half. He does a fantastic job giving feedback on almost everything you turn in and is definitely willing to help you become a better writer. Though his class may not be the most exciting, he is a fair grader and isn't too tough
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Would take again

comment: He mainly grades the discussion posts. I bought both books that were required but I didn't even open them up all semester! There are 4 big grades and he is a very clear grader and he gives very detailed feedback! Just put in good effort.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Would take again

comment: Hes a really good professor! He is very understanding and cares about his students grades. Hes super nice and there are no quizzes or test. Hes also an easy grader on the papers.

Mr. Ledford is a great teacher. We were supposed to use our english textbook, but he did not really check to make sure we did our readings. We did not have any tests or quizzes, but we did have a few easy group grades. We wrote 4 papers total. Final was a group project. Easy A if you do your work and respect the teacher. Would recommend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: He's really easy and gives good explanations of assignments and great/thorough feedback. Honestly he's a total pushover, so you can do what you want. His attendance requirements are only according to the English department's. I'm taking him for English 1102, so I think that testifies to the fact that this class is decent.
